metadata.title: CVE-2021-47571 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:staging: rtl8192e: Fix use after free in _rtl92e_pci_disconnect() Thefree_rtllib() function frees the "dev" pointer so there is use after freeon the next line. Re-arrange things to avoid that.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
